quotes.INFO: This is required for quote manager, it created to use with POST interface, to addQuoteURL it will send: addby=WhoAddedAQuote&author=WhoSaidTheQuote&quote=TheQuoteItself&key=addQuoteKey
quotes.INFO2: to getQuoteURL it will send mode=MODE&modeparams=SeeAboutModes

pos.INFO: Get the quote at specified position

fromto.INFO: Returns all quotes starting from 'from' arg to 'to' arg
